long_description: For trail hikes or kicking back in camp, the REI Ladro Hoodie jacket keeps you comfortable with breathability and light warmth. Use it as an outer layer or as an extra one when the temperatures drop. Soft, pique-knit midweight fabric has 4-way stretch for great mobility. Outer face resists precipitation and light wind and dries quickly; plus it resists abrasion and pilling. Cozy fleece interior backing traps warm air and is soft next to skin. Scuba-style hood and tall collar combine to hold in warmth; hood has a drawcord to refine the fit. Flatlock stitching eliminates abrasion, increases comfort and enhances fit by reducing bulky seams. Two zip hand pockets and zip sleeve pocket with media port. Interior windflap; chin guard; drawcord hem; thumb loops. REI Ladro hoodie has a sleek, close-to-body fit to boost fabric performance.
